title.narrative: Railway Energy Efficiency and Safety Enhancement Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: The Tranche 2 of Investment Program will finance (i) procurement of equipment that will enhance maintenance and safety and can respond to emergencies more quickly, efficiently, and effectively; and (ii) capacity building, including staff training.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is developed in the region.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Railway transport throughput expanded in the southwestern PRC to 470 billion ton-km for freight in 2016

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is developed in the region.

title.narrative: Cost of travel reduced from 35 fen/km in 2008 to 15 fen/km in 2016

description.narrative: An energy-efficient, safe, reliable, affordable, and environment-friendly railway transport system is developed in the region.

title.narrative: Railway transport throughput expanded in the southwestern PRC to 140 billion passenger-km for passengers in 2016

title.narrative: CO2 emissions in 2016 reduced by 22,000 tons
